## Turnover rates observed in Bibi et al's data per bin (a bin is 250k)

```{r}
bibiP <- 1.16794
bibiQ <- 0.9226987
```


```{r cache=TRUE}
Sys.time()
mclapply(1:200, FUN=function(i){
  tryCatch(makeFossilRecord(bibiP/0.25, bibiQ/0.25), error=function(e) {return(NA)})
})
Sys.time()
```
